newsitem.title: UK: European vacuum gas oil prices.
newsitem.headline: European vacuum gas oil prices.

text.p: NWE vacuum gas oil prices were little changed by the end of Wednesday as crude prices settled back to end-Tuesday levels, traders said.
Low sulphur bargers were assessed at around $158/$159 fob ARA. "It is very thin," one dealer said.
High sulphur barges were seen some $3 below low sulphur.

A week-old routine shutdown at Esso Karlsruhe's thermal cracker was expected to be ended by the coming weekend, traders said. The shutdown has led to total extra sales by the refinery of around 20,000 tonnes of VGO.
Cargo markets were tight and quiet. U.S. arbitrage demand was calculated at around $155 fob NWE, still a few dollars away from European prices.
